title: It's criminal for reporting scripter?
body: i posted 3 topics about riot should have better way to ban scripters in game, and i got negative point for reporting. Riot didn't wanna to stop them, you just punish for draft. Today, i played with 4 games and enemy scrips with gosu and script riven. im fuking DONE

replies.body: Did you report them in a support ticket, because _that's_ how you help get rid of scripters.
I think you need a dictionary
Difference between it being criminal and being downvoted.
People downvoting you is the same as been seen as a criminal?
